sentences.sContent: Biotech pharmaceuticals require networked intelligence to manage living soups as they flow by the barrelful from one vat to the next.
sentences.sContent_eng: Biotech pharmaceuticals require networked intelligence to manage living soups as they flow by the barrelful from one vat to the next.
sentences.sCn: 生物技术制药也需要这种网络化的智慧来管理那些“活体基液”在大桶容器之间的流动。
